website_summaries.verdict: A good middle-of-the-road option for students on a budget.
pros: A fast processor and plenty of RAM make this a good choice
the touchscreen and DVD burner are welcome bonuses
cons: The 1080p screen resolution makes it hard to see more than one thing on screen at a time
it uses an older WiFi standard, so internet speeds aren’t as fast as they could be

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't a bad computer but the keyboard did not light up and after about 2 weeks the hard drive crashed and would not reboot. I returned this computer but have had success with HP's in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: It seemed to be working fine the screen glitched a little but went back to ...
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to be working fine the screen glitched a little but went back to normal. I set it up and was surprised how fast it was. I went to bed and the next morning it doesn't work =/ the screen is black.
customer_reviews.author: AllyTheKid

customer_reviews.title: Awesome laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great computer for the money. Whole family loves it. Don't waste your money buying a $1000 laptop for normal use. We aren't drafting auto cad designs or anythi g on it but do almost everything else for day to day use
customer_reviews.author: Madison H.

customer_reviews.title: Failed in less than 8 weeks
customer_reviews.text: This laptop failed within less than 8 weeks of owning it. Now I'm left having to scramble to find someone who can fix it because it's my daughter's computer for school. Definitely won't by an HP in the future. Super disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joan P. Hammel

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The laptop functions just fine. Initially, it had quite a few junks for a new laptop; for example PUPs, which was a bit annoying. However once these junks were removed, it worked just fine. In terms of build quality, it felt cheap, although the design was sleek. Display is okay, speaker quality is better then expected, battery life is average. All in all its a good laptop for the price. I recommend it if you're on a budget but if you have a few extra dollars i suggest an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excited to have a great professional computer
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing !!! Beest purchase I have made for my buissness in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I Really like my new Laptop except for the mouse. Might be just me but the way it is slanted it is hard to tell when you are outside the mouse active area. I ended up purchasing an external mouse for this reason and to make gaming easier. The PC is easy to setup I have had it for about 3 weeks now with no issues with windows 10.
customer_reviews.author: kityre

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this HP laptop
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this HP laptop. After having only a few weeks and searching internet, an add popped up so I hit the sound button to mute it. Now it will not let me open the sound again. When I click the "X" to undo mute, it doesn't work and a problem detect box pops up, does a search for the problem then tells me to restart the computer to fix it. I do that and nothing has changed. I have a brand new laptop with no sound!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: I think its a really good computer for the price my only cons and theyre personal are that the keyboard is a bit more spaced out so thatll take some getting used to and the material aesthetically looks like plastic so it looks not as slick as others would. Performance wise its smooth and an enjoyable experience overall
customer_reviews.author: lyz

customer_reviews.title: Bad Battery 807956~001(2016/07)attached to the Hp Notebook 15.6" 2017 version Sold by Great_Deal 4U
customer_reviews.text: The battery that came with the system was bad and until I went through their review I found out I was not the only victim. Any purchase from Amzon via this group (Great_Deal 4U)I am advising customers to test the battery performance. Just within months my battery went flat and this is my first experience HP laptop I bought over ten years ago is still working with the battery working well.
customer_reviews.author: Dayo-Dee1

customer_reviews.title: Nice and good price
customer_reviews.text: My high school son is soooo happy to have this product. He's not complaining so I find it's perfect. It was reasonably priced compared to all of the others with the same memory ... I did my research. I haven't used it personally so that's my only disclaimer. However, if my 16 year old says it's awesome, it is. This is not his first laptop.
customer_reviews.author: brickhouse492

customer_reviews.title: It's been making terrible noise. It freezes. Bad support.
customer_reviews.text: It's been so slow and freezes a lot right after I bought it. Then started making noise with the cooling fan after a few months. It's been bothering me for months after that but I didn't fix because I was too busy and I didn't use it much. It was getting worse and worse. I finally replaced the fan last week. It seemed fine for the week but it started making the same noise again.
customer_reviews.author: W. Jeon

customer_reviews.title: Good PC.  Excellent purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop a few months ago and wanted to see how it performed before writing a review. I have been totally satisfied with this laptop. The screen has excellent resolution and the audio is clear. I've been using it for Zoom and Duo mtgs and have completely happy with it. I'm a writer and wanted a laptop with a disk drive for when I travel since wi-fi and downloading can be hard to access at times. It's all worked beautifully. I principally use it to run Word and Excel and mainly store files on a USB. Battery life is good, but I usually keep it plugged in. Would completely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: M A Young

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Once it boots up, it's fine, but more than half the time, it's slow to boot. Sometimes needing to update again, which makes it very annoying at the times when you just want to jump on to do something quickly and jump back off. To be fair, I don't use it often, so I may just be that I'm not on it enough for it to form a pattern of regularity.
customer_reviews.author: Dig

customer_reviews.title: Product falsely advertised as having high-definition (HD) webcam
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this laptop, the secondary description said that it had an "HP True Vision HD Webcam". When I received the laptop, the web cam quality was quite poor and I eventually figured out it was really a VGA web cam. When I inquired about this, the description on the product was suddenly changed to "HP webcam", but I was unable to get a partial refund from the seller to buy an external high-definition webcam to use with the laptop. Disappointing purchase as I need a HD webcam for my business. I am trying to figure out how to leave negative feedback with the seller, but seems that my purchase is too old for that feature to work.
customer_reviews.author: Jen51

customer_reviews.title: Nice Laptop, great price...
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop, I’ve other laptops and I’m using this one to replace and old one (use for testing) and so far I’ve no complains. It has a lot power and a lot of features for the price. I don’t think you will find a cheaper laptop with all the features this one offers. There’s also room to update the RAM (a plus) and it has enough hard drive space. I’ve been using a lot of apps on this one and it moves nice, so far, no complains. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: So slow it's useless
customer_reviews.text: Takes a minimum of 60 seconds to open anything - Dropbox, Chrome, Word. Slowest least responsive computer I've ever used. **Edited 11-19-18** After doing some research to try to speed up this hunk of junk, I found it came with a corrupted update database and it can't even be fixed. So they sent me defective junk but because it took so long to figure out the problem, I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bella

customer_reviews.title: great for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 15 year old to be able to do homework on. Watching HD movies is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Its not frequent but it is really annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well in the first few weeks then it started to have problems. The sound audio stopped working so I had to get that fixed and it later started to crash when I surf on the internet, play games, or try to multi-task all of sudden. Its not frequent but it is really annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Elon H.

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice computer for the price. I had it in a few days after ordering. Transferred everything over from my other computer (that is dying) to this one. I've had it almost a month and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this if you plan on using it
customer_reviews.text: Working fine for a month when sound card problems and no sound. I spent 3 hours on phone with HP getting that issue resolved. 4 months later hard drive went out and I was able to schedule a tech from HP to come out after they sent a new hard drive. He installed it and left with the recovery running. The recovery failed and I spent another hour and a half to a HP tech in India who reworked the recovery install and after that it failed again. Customer service is horrible! And the unit I have is junk right now. This will be the last time I order a notebook from here!
customer_reviews.author: William Reed

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: The grooved outside of then laptop makes it very difficult to personalize. While the memory isn't ideal for MMO activity, it is able to properly run two low graphics games. It's a very good starter laptop for students or just someone wanting the basics. Came with a two year warranty (who are wonderful, imo) that encourages you to call with any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great computer had it for a few months now
customer_reviews.text: This is a great computer had it for a few months now. Its only problem is myself when I go to show someone something and I touch the screen. Most of the time I forget that its touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: JENNI

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great PC - high performance - great value - great peformance
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Paulsen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't even deserve 1 star
customer_reviews.text: I have had this laptop for less than a year. I have no mouse cursor, I can only use the keypad and touch screen, and the touch screen is constantly spazzing out. Don't waste your money. I wouldn't recommend this laptop to anybody. I have had nothing but problems since day one.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan B.

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: Received what was supposed to be a new laptop. When I turned it on it already had a username and I couldn't log in. So now I have to return it, wait for my money, then buy another laptop and wait again to ship. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: RichS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great laptop for the price. It's fast and lightweight. I love it.!
customer_reviews.author: LSV13

customer_reviews.title: and the price is just perfect, it is fast
customer_reviews.text: I was worried because this was my first buy in amazon but it is Just as espected, it works very well, and the price is just perfect, it is fast, the touchscreen works awesome, good sound quality, all works perfectly highly recomended
customer_reviews.author: Henry Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Start up time and performance very poor
customer_reviews.text: It is not worth buying a cheap computer. The start up time averages >10 minutes when you account for the login errors and required reboots. This doubles in time when you need to install a software update which is seemingly every time you restart. The performance also lags when running multiple applications. While screen is large resolution is standard, so you basically just get an awkwardly large laptop. Battery life has been good.
customer_reviews.author: Benton

customer_reviews.title: I upgraded to this, it was worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.text: Finally, I love this laptop it has everything I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: fop

customer_reviews.title: Good PC for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom who uses it every day and she likes it quite a bit. Plenty of storage, fast enough for everyday tasks, light and decent battery life. Her only complaint is that the keypad buttons are a bit stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Rockjocky

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this laptop
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this laptop. We purchased it for a foreign exchange student and he loves it. It does everything it is supposed to and is just the right size for our student. He can stream videos, face time family, do homework, watch You Tube, and much much more! A great value!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Curry

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: sent it back was used with dirty key board no code
customer_reviews.author: leggs

customer_reviews.title: Lemon
customer_reviews.text: I had to send this back within two weeks of receiving it because the hard drive went bad. I have had it 1 year and 1 month and a new system download went through last week and then it wouldn't load websites. I used the disk clean on it and the entire system crashed. It won't even boot up now. I love HP computers but this one was a real lemon!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya T

customer_reviews.title: no blistering speed either but good.
customer_reviews.text: We are not very heavy users of a PC. This one has performed very well . It seems very suited to our needs. It's ,not slow ,no blistering speed either but good.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This computer gave us a little trouble in the beginning, 2 years ago. Last night it completely died. Very disappointing! Hard drive crashed and needs to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This laptop is okay. It is somewhat slow, ...
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is okay. It is somewhat slow, the sound doesn't work well, already had to have it worked on to get any sound at all.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W Brown

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up and use. My desktop had crashed and I needed a computer quickly. This was the perfect answer. I'm quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Oppel

customer_reviews.title: Does not live up to expectations
customer_reviews.text: This product does not live up to expectations. Way too slow even for internet use much less and programs that put any demand on the processor. Save your time and money and look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jay T

customer_reviews.title: GOOD LAPTOP
customer_reviews.text: GOT AS UPGRADE TO OLDER MODEL SOME FEATURES ARE DIFFERENT AND I DON'T LIKE IT BUT I HATE CHANGE SO GIVING IT A GOOD REVIEW AS THE BATTERY SEEMS TO LAST WAY LONGER
customer_reviews.author: trish

customer_reviews.title: ehh
customer_reviews.text: touch screens kinda a gimic on this guy as it’s not sensative and I dont believe and stylis works for it. Screen color is kinda off, a faded white like, some bog down lately. But over all for the price it’s a good large laptop.
customer_reviews.author: ozaffer

customer_reviews.title: ... months now and so far it is doing an amazing job. I've had no problems with it yet ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this laptop for a few months now and so far it is doing an amazing job. I've had no problems with it yet and it's doing a good job doing what I want it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Wolch

customer_reviews.title: Love my new HP
customer_reviews.text: Love my new HP...fast n very responsive for my daily use. Easy set-up. Depending on what task I am working on I love that I can switch back n forth from touch screen to my mouse...
customer_reviews.author: mdh88

customer_reviews.title: Processor (if not laptop itself) isnt reliable for studies n business
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed after installing a Epi database software, it worked well for a few days then started to lag. I hadn't anything on my drive. Had to reinstall several times, the result was same. There after i started experiencing the lag every often. Better processor needed.
customer_reviews.author: tourean j

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: My moms first laptop. East to use but she needed help to set it up but once we did she loves it,
customer_reviews.author: Amber H Neumann

customer_reviews.title: Gone
customer_reviews.text: I had this for 8 months and the hard drive died and won’t boot up. Never took it anywhere or dropped it. It just sat on my computer desk or I used it on the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Kanes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice laptop. I use it for my buisness. Plenty of memory and features.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Mcleland

customer_reviews.title: Needed a new computer really bad.
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't replaced my laptop in over eight years. The grandkids had plucked off keys and the spacebar was missing. My IT guy at worked helped me decide on this one and I have been completely satisfied with it. AC
customer_reviews.author: Arlene C.

customer_reviews.title: Battery dead after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop in Jan. and it has worked well for the most part. Fast forward 6 months: battery will not hold a charge at all! Wrote an email to the seller and am waiting on a response regarding this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Biene

customer_reviews.title: not nice and smooth like my Toshiba
customer_reviews.text: No big improvement. The surface is hard on my fingers,not nice and smooth like my Toshiba. Delivery person left it at my door and could have been taken very easily. Would Amazon be responsible____
customer_reviews.author: pamela Robison

customer_reviews.title: I use McAfee as well so it wasn't like it wasn't protected
customer_reviews.text: Less than a year and has already crapped out! Went from critical process died to black screen! My ASUS lasted 3 years! I use McAfee as well so it wasn't like it wasn't protected!
customer_reviews.author: Pwilly600

customer_reviews.title: SWITCH IN CHARACTERS/KEYS
customer_reviews.text: This first thing which was noticed is that the keys with Character (:) and (@) sign are not switched... when I depress the (@) character I got the (:) character and visa versa.... Have not had the chance to completely check off the characters, but I will soon and revert.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Elliot

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had about 4 months, but I love it! I only wish It was alittle smaller, but the price was right and I love all the storage it has
customer_reviews.author: ngl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very nice laptop. Great screen size. Fast for video editing and normal computer use. Needs charging very night but that doesn't bother me. Defiantly a great purchase. 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: jesse purcella

customer_reviews.title: Recommended Choice
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our high schooler. So far it's been easy to set up and easy to use. It's light weight and easy for her to carry around in her back pack.
customer_reviews.author: Juli Brenton

customer_reviews.title: Not that great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for only 14 months and the sound board has gone out on it. Of course it is out of warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara R.

customer_reviews.title: Don't trust tech support
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about it, but when I got locked out and tried to call tech support they wanted to freaking charge me a monthly fee for services. This I think is purely ridiculous. A new d right now it's used for personal but soon business as well.
customer_reviews.author: shawn taylor

customer_reviews.title: It's sufficiently fast.
customer_reviews.text: PC VERY nice for the price. I don't need anything too fancy and this lap-top is just perfect for home use. Quick & easy to load any outside programs I might want to install. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Light weight compared to my previous HP. I am getting used to it as my previous one is 10 years old.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: When I get real proficient with this,I will really love it.I'm kind of new on this stuff.Learning everyday.

customer_reviews.title: Last HP I’ll ever waste my money on!
customer_reviews.text: Slow computer, I am not pleased! I would return if I had realized sooner how 💩 this thing would be!

customer_reviews.title: Sound is very low for me even if at max volume.
customer_reviews.text: The volume was way too loo for watching movies, so I wore earphones quite a but. and it the whole computer would freeze but not very often.
customer_reviews.author: J759

customer_reviews.title: HP Notebook is just what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I am having to get used to Windows10,but I am well pleased so far. the computer seems to be just what I need.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer on October 5th, 2018 and it always takes about 5 min to boot up and now the battery wont hold a charge so i have to leave the laptop plugged in to use and even then it sometimes shuts off. I have had this laptop less than 3 months and the battery messed up about a month ago
customer_reviews.author: Markus

customer_reviews.title: One month in and it began to malfunction
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop on April 7th and on May 21st, I noticed the 'N' and 'B' keys stopped working. I took in in for repair where they had to replace the entire keyboard due to how this laptop is manufactured. After I got it back, the 'N' and 'B' keys worked but the mousepad completely stopped working. I have had it taken in 3 more times and the mousepad is still malfunctioning in the same way. DO NOT purchase this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Gski

customer_reviews.title: Scrolling is unnecessarily difficult. Sometimes the keys work to do that
customer_reviews.text: The computer works. However, compared to my Chromebook, browsing is frustrating. Touchpad and its keys are buggy. Scrolling is unnecessarily difficult. Sometimes the keys work to do that, sometimes they don't. I wish I would have bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Terrible do not buy will not turn on any more if I could I would give it zero stars please do not waste your money on this useless piece of garbage came with a virus on it

customer_reviews.title: It was easy moving my older software to the new machine
customer_reviews.text: This laptop does everything I need. It was easy moving my older software to the new machine. Very happy so far!

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for the price!

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop not good touch screen

customer_reviews.title: it is a good price for office laptop
customer_reviews.text: The touchpad is little bit hard to use but sometimes it can be replaced by touchscreen. Overall, it is a good price for office laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Lun

customer_reviews.title: 100% disk usage out of the box
customer_reviews.text: There is a known issue by HP that later windows updates will make the disk usage 100%, rendering the laptop worthless. Googling online tech support shows many individuals with this issue. $400 paper weight at the point.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my new computer!!! The touch screen is awesome and the size is perfect too!

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working altogether
customer_reviews.text: Speaker died after a month. Aftger getting tech support from Amazon which included attempting to install new drivers, I was then given instructions to revert the computer to it's default state. This caused the computer to die altogether. Now all I get is a flickering white screen. Amazon tells me over the phone to contact the seller, then they tell me via email to contact the manufacturer. Hopefullt I'll get this resolved, but very disappointing to have this happen after less than 2 months after delivery. I used the laptop for work only, no gaming. Just google chrome and Microsoft office.
customer_reviews.author: DavidRSA

customer_reviews.title: Constantly freezes up.
customer_reviews.text: Afte trying to set up this computer it started freezing up. I turned it off and then back on numerous times and it continued to freeze up. After a while, I couldn't even sign in. Needless to say, I returned it. I will continue to go thru the manufacturer for computers.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift to my mom who absolutely loves it! The touchscreen is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Liwbook

customer_reviews.title: Dead within a month
customer_reviews.text: Went to boot up and got an internal error message. HP support has been no help, now im out a laptop for all my work stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Steve C

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop for your money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price Pros Decent processing speed Excellent battery life on average 4 hours depending on use Excellent display Loud crisp sound Touchscreen works seamlessly (probably missing some pros buts thats what I can come up with from the top of my head) Cons Parts of keyboard feel sorta weird
customer_reviews.author: tercel

customer_reviews.title: It'll work for a year and then tank as soon as the warranty ends.
customer_reviews.text: Despite being well maintained, rarely moving and suffering no damage, it simply stopped turning on out of the blue.
customer_reviews.author: Trav

customer_reviews.title: We had to send it back to quit working after three weeks
customer_reviews.text: We had to send it back to quit working after three weeks
customer_reviews.author: robert butrum

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: lost sound. when I got back it is low volume.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Denise Wammack

customer_reviews.title: A good product.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this laptop for 2 years now with no issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Received it on Saturday, returned on Sunday. Would not connect to internet. Checked with internet provider and everything was okay on that end. Got a new modem just in case, wasn't that either. Very disappointed, I was really looking forward to a new PC.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Windows 10 laptop
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the purchase, my 1st laptop with Windows 10 - very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: George Walter Hurst

product_meta.title: HP Notebook 15.6 Inch Touchscreen Premium Laptop PC (2017 Version), 7th Gen Intel Core i3-7100U 2.4GHz Processor, 8GB DDR4 RAM, 1TB HDD, Bluetooth, Windows 10
product_meta.description:
Windows 10 operating systemWindows 10 brings back the Start Menu from Windows 7 and introduces new features, like the Edge Web browser that lets you markup Web pages on your screen. 
15.6" touch screenTypical 1366 x 768 HD resolution. Natural finger-touch navigation makes the most of Windows 10. Energy-efficient WLED backlight. 
8th Gen Intel® Core™ i3-8130U mobile processorSmart dual-core, four-way processing performance for HD-quality computing. 
8GB system memory for advanced multitaskingSubstantial high-bandwidth RAM to smoothly run your games and photo- and video-editing applications, as well as multiple programs and browser tabs all at once. 
1TB hard drive for ample file storage spaceHolds a sizeable collection of digital photos, music, HD videos and DVD-quality movies. 5400 rpm spindle speed for standard read/write times. Cloud support lets you access your files anywhere Intel® UHD Graphics 620 
Weighs 4.52 lbs. and measures 0.9" thinBalances portability and screen size, so you get a respectable amount of viewing space without the laptop being too cumbersome for practical portability. 
3-cell lithium-ion battery. 
HDMI output expands your viewing optionsConnect to an HDTV or high-def monitor to set up two screens side by side or just see more of the big picture. 
Built-in media reader for simple photo transferSupports SD memory card formats. 
Wireless and wired network connectivityBuilt-in high-speed wireless LAN connects to your network or hotspots on the most common Wi-Fi standards. The Gigabit Ethernet LAN port also plugs into wired networks. 
Additional portHeadphone/microphone combo jack.
feature_bullets: 15.6 in HD WLED-backlit touchscreen display (1366 x 768)
7th Generation Intel Core i3-7100U 2.40 GHz dual core Processor (3M Cache), Intel HD Graphics 620
8GB DDR4 SDRAM 2133 MHz Memory, 1TB 5400 RPM Hard Drive
802.11b/g/n (Miracast enabled), Bluetooth 4.0, Multiformat SD, DTS Studio Sound with dual speakers, 1 USB 3.0, 2 USB 2.0, 1 HDMI, Headphone output/Microphone input combo, LAN (10/100), HP webcam
Windows 10 home 64 bit, 3-Cell Lithium-Ion Battery (31 Wh), 15.12 x 10.0 x 0.95, 4.60 lbs, Black.
